name: Colby Estate Little Craig Y Borian Walk, Colby

ai.summary: A 6.7 km moderate hike in Colby, UK, featuring mixed terrain on forest tracks and rural paths with gentle elevation changes and opportunities to enjoy local estate scenery.
ai.terrain_summary: The route combines shaded woodland trails with grassy field edges and occasional uneven surfaces. Expect muddy patches after rain, occasional rocks, and gates or stiles along field boundaries.
ai.safety_notes: Check the weather forecast and plan for changing conditions. Wear sturdy footwear and clothing appropriate for mud and rain. Carry sufficient water and a snack. Stay on marked paths, watch for uneven ground, and mind gates or livestock. Use a map or GPS and inform someone of your route and expected return time.
recommended_gear: Sturdy hiking boots or shoes with good grip
Weather-appropriate clothing including a waterproof/windproof layer
Map or GPS device (or offline map on smartphone)
Hat and sunscreen for sun protection
Lightweight rain jacket and extra warm layer
ai.best_seasons: Spring through autumn (roughly March to October) typically offers milder and drier conditions; winter hikes are possible with extra precautions and appropriate gear.

seo.title: Colby Estate Little Craig Y Borian Walk – 6.7 km Moderate Hike in Colby, UK
seo.meta_description: Discover a 6.7 km moderate hike at Colby Estate: Little Craig Y Borian Walk. Learn about terrain, safety tips, best seasons, and essential gear for a UK countryside trek.
